infantry.name: Infantry
infantry.desc: Basic foot soldiers. Cheap, reliable, and effective in numbers.

gunner.name: Gunner
gunner.desc: Specialized in laying down heavy fire to suppress enemy positions.

mech_light.name: Light Mech
mech_light.desc: A fast, agile walker effective at flanking and hit-and-run tactics.

mech.name: Mech
mech.desc: A heavily armored combat walker, designed for frontline assaults.

mech_artillery.name: Artillery Mech
mech_artillery.desc: A mobile fire support platform capable of long-range bombardment. Cannot be transported.

artillery.name: Artillery
artillery.desc: Artillery piece, vulnerable but devastating at a distance.

truck.name: Truck
truck.desc: Lightly armored transport for rapidly deploying infantry, gunners and artillery units.

battleship.name: Battleship
battleship.desc: The pinnacle of naval power, offering immense fire support. Capable of transporting up to 2 units.

ship.name: Ship
ship.desc: A versatile naval transport, capable of carrying units.

plane.name: Plane
plane.desc: Provides air superiority and Support to the battlefield. Cannot be transported.

GOC_MEKH.name: Mekhane Followers
GOC_MEKH.desc: Devout followers of the Broken God, clad in blessed machinery.

GOC_INF.name: G.O.C. Team
GOC_INF.desc: Highly trained operatives equipped with advanced para-weaponry.

MTF.name: MTF
MTF.desc: Mobile Task Force: The Foundation's elite soldiers for containment.

049.desc: The 'Plague Doctor'. Converts fallen infantry into zombie allies.

096.desc: The 'Shy Guy'. Docile until observed, then becomes an unstoppable engine of destruction.

173.desc: The 'Sculpture'. Extremely fast and lethal, but only when unobserved.

682.desc: The 'Hard-to-Destroy Reptile'. Incredibly resilient and adaptive. Each time it's destroyed , it will reassemble itself and gains +1DEF.

939.desc: 'With Many Voices'. Pack hunters that mimic human speech to lure prey.

1048_b.name: 1048-B
1048_b.desc: A hostile duplicate of the 'Builder Bear', made of human ears.

1048_c.name: 1048-C
1048_c.desc: A hostile duplicate of the 'Builder Bear', made of scrap metal.

1048_d.name: 1048-D
1048_d.desc: A hostile duplicate of the 'Builder Bear', made of human limbs.

Flesh_INF.name: Hate
Flesh_INF.desc: A twisted mass of flesh and hatred, forming a basic combat bio-form.

Flesh_ART.name: Despise
Flesh_ART.desc: A stationary bio-artillery that spews corrosive projectiles.

Flesh_MECH.name: Loathe
Flesh_MECH.desc: A large, durable creature that embodies loathing for all life.

Flesh_MASS.name: Abominate
Flesh_MASS.desc: An enormous, slow-moving abomination that stops everything in its path.

Flesh_TYRANID.name: Execrate
Flesh_TYRANID.desc: Fast and agile, pursuits it's enemies for long distances.

Flesh_CITY.name: Hell (c)
Flesh_CITY.desc: A living, growing Flesh citadel that spawns lesser bio-forms.

Flesh_VILLAGE.name: Abyss (v)
Flesh_VILLAGE.desc: A smaller Flesh hive that spreads corruption and generates resources.

Zombie_INF.name: Zombie
Zombie_INF.desc: A shambling corpse. Weak alone, but terrifying in a horde.

Zombie_INFSMART.name: Smarts
Zombie_INFSMART.desc: A more intelligent zombie, capable of covering enemy troops into its own.

Zombie_MECH.name: Gigant
Zombie_MECH.desc: A bloated, gargantuan zombie that can smash through defenses.

Zombie_FLYING.name: Birds
Zombie_FLYING.desc: A swarm of infected birds, excellent for scouting and harassing.

Zombie_SHIP.name: Whale
Zombie_SHIP.desc: A reanimated whale carcass, a formidable and horrifying naval unit.

Zombie_Feature.name: Zombie Base
Zombie_Feature.desc: A nest of undead corruption that continuously spawns new zombies.
